verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nityajeevamu chepatti satyavedamu chebooni (2) Pavitra hrudayamulatho poraadudi vijayamutho{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Neetini bhaktinigori nijamaina viswaaasuluga Orpunu premanu kalgi poraadudi vijayamutho{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aakaashamuna nundi kaligina darshanamunaku Avidheyatha choopakanu poraadudi vijayamutho{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kristesu manasu kaligi satkriyalanu jariginchi Yodhulugaa niluchundi poraadudi vijayamutho{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Deena manasu kaligi priyulaara lobadiyu Mahima kireetamukai poraadudi vijayamutho{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}aatmala rakshana korakai arpinchudi jeevithamu Antamu varaku nilichi poraadudi vijayamutho{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesuni jeevamu kaligi ilalo shramanorchuchu Vijayothsaahamu thoda halleluya paadedamu{/lang-eng}
